headline.main: RETURN OF THE DANIEL WEBSTER.; ARRIVAL OF UNITED STATES TROOPS STRENGTHENING OF THE GULF FORTS TROOPS LEFT INTEXAS.

docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship Daniel Webster, Capt. MINER, under charter of the Government, arrived at this port on Saturday, from Brazos, St. Jago, March 19, Fort Jefferson 24th, and Fort Taylor 25th, with United States troops. Her passengers are, Mrs. L.O. Morris, child and servant, First Artillery; Major F.J. Porter, Adjutant-General.
